Description.p:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent aspects of housing including current housing situation and suitability of housing.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Housing subset with subset original id 5991000000137.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
